篇.definition: sheet; piece of writing; bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old); classifier for written items: chapter, article

篇幅.definition: length (of a piece of writing); space occupied on a printed page

篇章.definition: chapter; section (of a written work); passage of writing; (fig.) chapter (in the history of sth)

篇韻.definition: abbr. for Yupian 玉篇[Yu4 pian1] and Guangyun 廣韻|广韵[Guang3 yun4]
